Hi Everyone,

   I am new here but not new to EVP.    I have been recording=
 since 2000.    I have some great EVP to share as soon as I can.  I saw the=
 BOX and want very much to build my own.   I looked at  some    of the file=
s and am very confused.    Can someone direct me to the right place to star=
t building my own box?  I am very excited about this concept.  I am not an =
electronic person but I wilol try to find some help.  Thanks in advance for=
 all your help!

                                                          =
  Rheta
                                                             NCEVP@=
yahoogroups
